thread.section_title: Purolator Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Purolator | purolator.ca
thread.title: RD

author: RD
title: RD
text:
I don't even know how these guys are still in business to be honest. They're so awful. They never knock, just dump your box on the doorstep. There can be multiple cars in the driveway and they still won't bother knocking.
They dropped the box off in the middle of a monsoon, without knocking of course, leaving me with a soggy box and junk inside.
They don't update their shipping info. I've had something sitting in Ontario for a week now. Just sitting there. Despite the fact that it was supposed to arrive 5 days ago.
Do they even work? Like... sorry to actual delivery men out there who work hard for their money, but really?!
